casebody.data:
SOKOL HOLDINGS, INC., Thomas Sinclair, and Brian Savage, Defendants and Counterclaim Plaintiffs Below, Appellants, Cross-Appellees,
v.
Margolis EDELSTEIN, Marcus & Auerbach, Jerome Marcus, Jonathan Auerbach, and Herbert Mondros, Plaintiffs and Counterclaim Defendants Below, Appellees, Cross-Appellants. No. 296, 2017 Supreme Court of Delaware.

Submitted: May 16, 2018
Decided: May 17, 2018
Corrected: May 18, 2018

AFFIRMED.
